import { exhibitions } from "Apps/__test__/Fixtures//SelectedExhibitions" import { bio } from "Apps/__test__/Fixtures/ArtistBio" import { imageData } from "Apps/__test__/Fixtures/Artwork/imageData" import { artistResponse } from "Apps/__test__/Fixtures/MarketInsights" import React from "react" import { createFragmentContainer, graphql } from "react-relay" import styled from "styled-components" import { FullArtworkGrid, Tab, Tabs } from "Styleguide/Components" import { Col, Row } from "Styleguide/Elements/Grid" import { ArtistInfo } from "./Components/ArtistInfo" import { ArtworkDetailsFragmentContainer as ArtworkDetails } from "./Components/ArtworkDetails" import { ArtworkSidebarFragmentContainer as ArtworkSidebar } from "./Components/ArtworkSidebar" import { Banner } from "./Components/Banner" import { ImageCarousel } from "./Components/ImageCarousel" import { OtherWorks } from "./Components/OtherWorks" import { ArtworkApp_artwork } from "__generated__/ArtworkApp_artwork.graphql" export interface Props { artwork: ArtworkApp_artwork } export const ArtworkApp: React.SFC = props => { const slideshowImages = [ imageData(800, 600), imageData(500, 400), imageData(300, 700), imageData(800, 600), imageData(700, 600), imageData(500, 600), ] return ( Related works View all TODO: Image Francesca DiMattio American, b. 1979 Follow TODO: Image Jennifer Allora & Guillermo Calzadilla American, b. 1979 Follow Recently viewed Artwork Brick Artwork Brick Artwork Brick
Buy Buying from Galleries FAQ Buying from Auctions FAQ Consign with Artsy Learn Education The Art Genome Project About us About Blog Jobs Open Source Press Contact Send us feedback Partner with us Artsy for Galleries Artwsy for Museums Artsy for Auctions
) } export const ArtworkAppFragmentContainer = createFragmentContainer( ArtworkApp, graphql` fragment ArtworkApp_artwork on Artwork { ...ArtworkSidebar_artwork ...ArtworkDetails_artwork } ` ) const ArtworkSlider = styled.div`` const FollowButton = styled.div`` const Name = styled.div`` const Metadata = styled.div`` const GridBlock = styled.div`` const Title = styled.div`` const ViewAllButton = styled.div`` const RelatedWorks = styled.div`` const RelatedArtists = styled.div`` const RelatedArtistItem = styled.div`` const Image = styled.div`` const RecentlyViewed = styled.div`` const Slider = styled.div`` const Category = styled.div`` const CategoryLarge = styled.div`` const Slides = styled.div`` const Slide = styled.div`` const Footer = styled.div``
